snippet: After several delays and setbacks, the makers of the Pebble wristwatch, a device that can wirelessly link to a smartphone and that raised more than $10 million on Kickstarter, say they are finally ready to start shipping to eager customers.
abstract: After several delays and setbacks, the makers of the Pebble wristwatch, a device that can wirelessly link to a smartphone and that raised more than $10 million on Kickstarter, say they are finally ready to start shipping to eager customers.

headline.main: C.E.S. 2013: After Delays, Pebble Wristwatch Will Ship Jan. 23
